keyword: how many calories are in drumsticks
title: How Many Calories Are in Drumsticks?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in drumsticks (2 medium roasted chicken drumsticks), plus full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Drumsticks?
assumptions: Medium-sized chicken drumsticks with skin, roasted without added oil or sauce; ~75g each with bone (~62g edible).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin removal, and seasonings. Check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: Two medium roasted chicken drumsticks provide ~344 kcal and ~37 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp BBQ sauce per drumstick

faqs.q: How many calories are in one chicken drumstick?
faqs.a: About 172 kcal for one medium roasted drumstick with skin.

faqs.q: How many calories are in drumsticks without skin?
faqs.a: Roughly 112 kcal per skinless roasted drumstick, saving ~60 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 2 drumsticks?
faqs.a: Approximately 37 g protein from two medium roasted chicken drumsticks.
No significant carbs (0 g) in plain roasted chicken drumsticks.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in drumsticks?
faqs.a: Roasted: ~172 kcal; fried adds ~80 kcal per drumstick due to oil absorption.
